 <img src="http://open.ifmo.ru/images/1/12/2268691_int087.gif"/> The interference fringes are observed in the air
    wedge made in the travelling light of two glass planes and a
    wire clamped between them. Find the wire diameter if wavelength
    is 550 nm, h = 3 sm, interference pattern pitch is 0.05
    mm.  No right answer. 0.495 mm 0.33 mm 0.165 mm 0.0825 mm 0.0415 mm
